species.name: Pantoran
species.description: Pantorans are a near-human species with skin of various shades of blue and yellow eyes (wiht some rare instances of black). Their hair ranges in color from black and blue to light purple and white. They have an average height similar to that of humans, a bit less than two meters. Their physiology allows them to be comfortable in lower temperatures, requiring only a couple of layers of casual clothing in icy climates. In all other aspects, Pantorans are nearly identical to humans.
species.startSkills: Begin with 1 rank in either Cool or Negotiation.
species.specialAbilities: May remove 1 Setback imposed due to cold environmental conditions.
